tweets.text:
Income from fishing licence sales in Lincs and Northants in October was ¬£1,244,874 compared to ¬£1,050,498 last October. This will help us keep on helping the environment.

Want to contribute? Buy a licence at https://t.co/BRukTUePF6 #Fish #Fishing https://t.co/y13nS0kHoI

It's little things that make our collective efforts worthwhile.
Spur us on to achieve more.

The majority of Earth's chalk streams & rivers are found in England; fragile, extraordinary ecologies.
But they're dying from water company over-extraction, pollution & @EnvAgency inaction.
@Feargal_Sharkey is leading an event (8 Dec) on stopping the rot.
https://t.co/znRcXVS58x

tweets.text: This Winter our YDCP Officer is tackling sediment entering our watercourses with @EnvAgencyYNE Doing More for the Derwent project. Working with landowners, we aim to reduce this type of pollution, which will increase river health and reduce flood risk.Stay tuned for more details! https://t.co/vo6xB6ZVAu
@xmarkxryanx1 @BaltimorePeace @EnvAgencyNW @RSPBEngland @unitedutilities @WildHaweswater Nest in the gravel scooped out to lay eggs into.

@xmarkxryanx1 @leeinthelakes @EnvAgencyNW @RSPBEngland @unitedutilities @WildHaweswater Now that one I already knew, from reading about salmon before. But while my reading has usually focused on American salmon, that word is used here too. But hooching definitely isn't. My spellcheck kept trying to switch it to 'mooching' as I wrote this.

tweets.text: @leeinthelakes @EnvAgencyNW @RSPBEngland @unitedutilities @WildHaweswater Hooching. I learned a new word today. Very cool.
"@EnvAgency has already owned up that the River Cam and its tributaries are in a declining state. They are in the process of being drained dry and the remains of them filled full of sewage."

‚ÄúHere's the thing - you are not going to have 67,000 extra houses without water and without a means of disposing of the sewage. But right now nobody seems capable or prepared to even confront or ask those two questions.‚Äù
@mhclg @SimonClarkeMP @pow_rebecca https://t.co/04q2BwKUIi
